entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to snow in the evening and ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
